## Historical and Current Fishery Information
Off the coast of Washington `r spp` is primarily caught in the recreational/sport fishery with very little mortaltiy from commercial fishing. `r Spp` has been a target of recreational fishing as early as 1934 with catches stabilizing around 2,500 - 3,000 fish per year starting around 1980 with the exception of selected years with high (2005) or low catches (2015).
